QuestionArr.question:
What is the output of the following code?

x = 6
y = 2
print(x ** y, x // y)
QuestionArr.correct_msg: The Exponent (**) operator performs exponential (power) calculation. so here 6 ** 2 means 6*6 = 36 The // is the Floor Division operator so 6//2=3
QuestionArr.incorrect_msg: The Exponent (**) operator performs exponential (power) calculation. so here 6 ** 2 means 6*6 = 36 The // is the Floor Division operator so 6//2=3
